recipe.title: Fresh Tomatillo Salsa
ingredients: 1/2 pound small fresh tomatillos, husked and rinsed
1 tablespoon chopped fresh serrano chile with seeds, or to taste
instructions: Coarsely chop tomatillos, then purée with remaining salsa ingredients and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a blender until smooth.
